attributes.action: Reverse the considerable increases in fees for UK visas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From April, the fees for UK visas will rise substancially e.g. the cost of an 'indefinite leave to remain' visa will rise from an already high £335 (£500 for the premium service) to £750 (£950 for the premium service).

This level of increase for what is basically a few hours of administrative service is deeply unfair and should be reversed immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
